campaign.story:
Cristina Agostini-Fitch, Chris McNabb, Beck Kitsis, Zach Fleming, and Adam Kolodny tech scouting our location
STRETCH GOAL OF $8,000!!
WOW! Thanks to your overwhelming generosity, love, and support, we have successfully met our initial $17,000 Kickstarter goal for VALENTINE!!! Earlier in the year, if you had told us that any of this would be happening, we never would have believed you. But now, thanks to your incredible help, we have the funds needed to move into production this June, and to do so safely!!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!! 
WE ARE OFFICIALLY SETTING A STRETCH GOAL OF $8,000!!! This will not only cover unforeseen location and transportation costs that have developed during the course of pre-production, but also help with our sound mix, color correction, music, DCP, and film festival submissions. With these crucial final steps, we'll finally be able to release the film into the world. OUR CAMPAIGN ENDS ON MAY 20 at 10:30AM ET. It is our hope, that by the end of it, we will have the budget we need to finally share our story.
VALENTINE is a short film about a couple that heads to the Catskills for a romantic getaway. However, over the course of the night, issues surrounding gender & identity threaten to unravel the seams of the relationship.
Nan Goldin
I was 26 years old when I realized that I was transgender. My gender had always been a constant source of tension for me. No one explicitly told me that to be trans was to be othered or hated or laughed at, but they didn’t have to -- it was written into the media I consumed.   
Nan Goldin
When I finally came out as nonbinary, I had already been dating my partner Beck, a ciswoman, for about two years -- it was as much a reckoning with her own identity as it was for mine. Based on a true experience, VALENTINE explores how shifting identities can affect a romantic relationship and test the strengths of love between two people. 
Black Swan (2010)
Too often do I see movies with this type of story end in total rejection of the trans character. In our film, we hope to show a more nuanced relationship in all of its complexities, one that feels authentic to our own lives.
Euphoria (2019)
As a filmmaker, I am committed to creating stories that center the trans experience, so that the next generation of trans kids searching for validation and affirmation can see themselves and their stories reflected back to them onscreen. To have that in my own childhood would have been everything -- perhaps I could have spent more time just living my life, rather than imagining it.
Philip-Lorca diCorcia
Chris McNabb (Co-Writer/Co-Director/Editor)
CHRIS MCNABB (they/them) is a Brooklyn-based filmmaker, two-time Emmy Award-winning editor, and Sundance Documentary Edit & Story Lab Fellow. They edited the feature-length documentary WHOSE STREETS? (Magnolia Pictures), which premiered at the 2017 Sundance Film Festival to critical acclaim and was later nominated for two Gotham Awards, a Critics’ Choice Award, and a Peabody Award. Their past nonfiction work also includes the feature documentary NARROWSBURG (2019 Camden International Film Festival, DOC NYC 2019), the interactive documentary {THE AND} (IDFA 2014), and the accompanying short film {THE AND} MARCELA & ROCK (Sundance Film Festival 2015). In addition, Chris recently edited two short fiction films, THE RAT (Sundance Film Festival 2019) and THE THREE MEN YOU MEET AT NIGHT (Fantastic Fest 2020). Currently, Chris is editing a documentary about a high-profile musician for a major studio. They are also editing WALK BY ME, a follow-up to the 1990 Sundance Filmmaker Trophy Award-winning documentary METAMORPHOSIS.
Whose Streets? ed. Chris McNabb
Beck Kitsis (Co-Writer/Co-Director/Producer)
BECK KITSIS (she/her) is an award-winning filmmaker and musician based in New York City. In 2019, she was selected as a Sundance Screenwriters Intensive Fellow, a Women at Sundance Financing Intensive Fellow, and a member of Film at Lincoln Center’s Artist Academy at the 57th New York Film Festival. Beck’s debut short film THE THREE MEN YOU MEET AT NIGHT (2020 Fantastic Fest) premiered at the Maryland Film Festival and went on to win multiple awards, including Best After Dark Short at the Indie Memphis Film Festival. In addition, Beck produced the documentary NARROWSBURG (Camden International Film Festival, DOC NYC 2019), the short horror film THE RAT (Sundance Film Festival 2019), and the experimental short THE INCONCEIVABLE MOUNTAIN (NoBudge - Best Films of 2019). Currently, Beck is co-writing/producing the Sundance and Cinereach supported feature-length horror film STRAWBERRY SUMMER and in pre-production on her next short film, VALENTINE. Beck also co-founded NITE SHIFT, a New York-based film and media collective formed in 2016. 
The Three Men You Meet at Night, dir. Beck Kitsis
Katy Drake Bettner (Producer)
KATY DRAKE BETTNER (she/her) will produce damn near anything but is most excited about enabling talented creatives to scope, advance, refine, and execute their unique vision. Recent credits include SWALLOW (Tribeca), WILD INDIAN (Sundance), CUSP (Sundance), ALWAYS IN SEASON (Sundance), PRAY AWAY (Tribeca), THE FIGHT (Sundance), and RAISE HELL: THE LIFE & TIMES OF MOLLY IVINS (Sundance). Katy is a member of the Women at Sundance Leadership Council, has served as an advisor for the Sundance Creative Producing Lab and Summit, and has advised for the Women in Film/Sundance financing strategy summit, as well as the Documentary Producers Alliance. In 2019, Katy and Amy Redford (dir. THE GUITAR, pro. PROFESSOR MARSDEN AND THE WONDER WOMEN) created BetRed Stories as a collaboration hub for their shared projects. Katy and her husband Paul Bettner (Words with Friends, Age of Empires, New Super Luckys Tale) founded Playful Studios in McKinney Texas in 2012. She has a specific affinity for the Texas creative community and is most proud of being blocked by the states indicted Attorney General, Ken Paxton.
Zach Fleming (Producer)
ZACH FLEMING (he/him) is a Brooklyn-based producer and filmmaker. He produced the award winning short film PARTY DRESS, which won GirlGaze’s female filmmaker competition, judged by industry heavyweights like Shonda Rhimes, Gia Coppola and Joey Soloway. In the commercial world, he’s produced work for brands like Ben and Jerry’s, Burger King, LoveWellness, and Zola (a commercial for the latter got the CEO of Hallmark to step down), among others. He most recently produced the short film (YOU'LL MAKE IT IN) FLORIDA, which played at dozens of festivals around the world, including Fantastic Fest, Florida Film Festival, IndieLisboa, Sarasota Film Festival, and the Phoenix Film Festival, where it won Best Live Action Short. Zach’s last short film STAYCATION screened at Boston Underground Film Festival and The Lower East Side Film Festival before its online premiere on NoBudge. His music videos have been featured in Spin and Impose Magazine.
Adam Kolodny (Director of Photography)
ADAM KOLODNY (he/him) is an award-winning cinematographer based in New York City. His music videos for Japanese Breakfast, Conor Oberst, Frankie Cosmos, Charly Bliss, Jay Som, and Mannequin Pussy have gained praise from publications like Rolling Stone and Pitchfork (twice appearing on the "Best 25 Music Videos of the Year" list). His work has screened at many festivals, including Sundance, SXSW, and Raindance. Recent credits include the Viceland series THE DEVIL YOU KNOW, the short film THE THREE MEN YOU MEET AT NIGHT (Fantastic Fest 2020), the narrative feature DALE'S LATE, as well as camera work on the 2017 Sundance Grand Jury Award Winner UNREST.
Road Head by Japanese Breakfast, DP. Adam Kolodny
Told Slant (Composer)
TOLD SLANT is the songwriting project of Felix Walworth (they/them), a Brooklyn based lyricist and producer. Walworth started the project in 2011 as a means of marking a stylistic shift in their songwriting, specifically a shift toward understated, ambling arrangements and simple, illustrative lyrics. They have been highlighted as one of the top most influential artists of contemporary independent music on NPR, Pitchfork, The FADER, Rolling Stone, Stereogum, and more. Most recently, they scored the short film THE RAT (Sundance Film Festival 2019).
Port Authority (2019), Casting Director: Kate Antognini
Kate Antognini (Casting Director)
KATE ANTOGNINI (she/her) is a New York-based casting director and street scout for feature films, TV shows, and commercials. Kate's recent credits include the Nathan Fielder-produced narrative-documentary hybrid HOW TO WITH JOHN WILSON for HBO, as well as the feature-length films GOLDIE (Berlin 2019) and PORT AUTHORITY (2019), which was executive produced by Martin Scorsese and premiered at Cannes Un Certain Regard. Currently, she is casting RUNNER, a feature from Cinetic & Easy Riders films.
Cristina Agostini-Fitch (Production Designer)
CRISTINA AGOSTINI-FITCH (she/her) is a production designer, art director, and prop stylist who splits her time between New York and Puerto Rico. Recent credits include (YOU’LL MAKE IT IN) FLORIDA (2020), BREAKING AND ENTERING (2020), and THE ENTITLEMENT (2018), as well as music videos for Gabriel Garzón and Pinc Louds. She also works in the commercial wold with clients like La Mer, Essie, and Maybelline.
Amit Gajwani (Costume Designer)
AMIT GAJWANI (he/him) was born in Mumbai, India. At the age of 12, he moved to the United States. The confluence of the two cultures has had a direct affect on his approach to design. He also found a love for historical costumes during his travels around the world. The combination of historic and cultural influences are evident in his designs. Amit’s work can be seen around the world in celebrity commercials, fashion advertisements, and films. Recent film credits include BRAID (Tribeca Film Festival), KATIE SAYS GOODBYE (Toronto Film Festival), WHY NOT CHOOSE LOVE: A MARY PICKFORD MANIFESTO, ODD MAN RUSH, and MODERN PERSUASION.
Katie Says Goodbye (2016), Costume Designer: Amit Gajwani
Isadora Dias Vieira (Assistant Director)
ISADORA DIAS VIEIRA (she/her) is a versatile filmmaker working to build groundbreaking narratives that challenge the status quo. She believes that dismantling the dominant gaze in cinema can also be an inside job. Most invariably her work and research is about the representation of women and underrepresented or misrepresented realities in media. With over ten years of industry experience, she has worked for some of the biggest production companies in the world navigating through fiction, documentary and experimental film.
Anthony Thompson (Production Sound)
ANTHONY THOMPSON (he/him) is a sound mixer and audio visual technician who has worked in narrative and documentary production for a number years. Recent credits include THE THREE MEN YOU MEET AT NIGHT (2020), DON'T LOOK (2018), CREEDMORIA (2016), FALL TO RISE (2014), and GIMME THE LOOT (2012).
Elle Simone (Production Assistant)
ELLE SIMONE (she/her) is an actor, writer, production and media consultant, and all around jack-of-all-trades from Southern New York. She recently worked on films such as JUST CHICKEN and OLD HEN, as well as projects for Penguin Random House Audio, The Laurie Berkner Band, and Queer Kid Stuff. She graduated from Ithaca College in 2015, focusing on acting and theatre studies. She graduated from SUNY Westchester in 2018, studying Digital Filmmaking. She is currently working on starting a Twitch channel and developing her own original content.
Irene Dambriunas (Production Assistant)
IRENE DAMBRIUNAS (she/her) is a pastry chef and baking instructor based in Queens, NY. She has been working in restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries across NYC since 2014, and she always has loud, heavy tunes playing while she works. Pies are her favorite dessert to prepare, often drawing inspiration from horror movies and fantasy elements in her pie crust designs. She believes that scones are a truly underappreciated pastry. Currently, Irene is an instructor and recipe developer for Invictus Enterprises, a non-profit organization training neurodivergent young adults to run their own bakery in Brooklyn. You can check out more of her work on Instagram at @blackmetalpastrychef.
Keiran McCann (Graphic Designer)
KEIRAN MCCANN (she/her) is a Brooklyn-based design professional with 8+ years of experience. She has a unique ability to bring creative, project management and effective strategy together – a skillset honed from her educational, professional, and personal experiences. With innovative thinking, passion and collaboration, her goal is to elevate the brands she works with by producing beautiful designs that meet business objectives. She is currently working as the Design Director for the real estate fin-tech startup EasyKnock, where she is responsible for conceptualizing, creating, and managing the output of design collateral across a multitude of channels.
We are currently in pre-production and aiming to move into production this June. In order to do so, we need to raise at least $17,000 to rent camera gear, lighting equipment, props, costumes, and -- most importantly -- to cover COVID costs to keep our team safe.
We believe that producing VALENTINE will ultimately help make more room for future stories from queer and nonbinary filmmakers. Making this film as a grassroots, independent production will ensure that we are able to tell our story with unwavering commitment to authenticity and social impact. However, this approach comes with its fair share of challenges. In order to take on this project and raise the funds necessary to make the film, we are asking for the generous support of our community.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any other short film, there are financial risks involved in producing VALENTINE. While we will continue to apply for more grants, we are aware that they are incredibly competitive, so we cannot rely on grant funding to finance our film. Instead of putting the fate of our project in the hands of a few decision-makers, we have decided to turn to our community of friends, filmmakers, and activists at Kickstarter to fundraise the additional money we need to make VALENTINE a reality.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Valentines,
WOW!!!! THANK YOU!!!! We can’t believe we’re writing this update right now, but thanks to your overwhelming generosity, love, and support during these first five days, we have successfully met our initial $17,000 Kickstarter goal for VALENTINE!!! Earlier in the year, if you had told us that any of this would be happening, we never would have believed you. Even just a couple of months ago, Beck and I simply couldn’t imagine a world without quarantine, never mind a world where we might be able to raise the budget necessary to make our film. But now, thanks to your help, we have the funds needed to move into production this June, and to do so safely. THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!!

campaign.story:
Hello Everyone!! 
     This album has been something I’ve wanted to do for a long time and its finally coming to fruition!  My singer/songwriter pseudonym K.C. Jones has been a side project I’ve done for a while but never released a record as and I am so proud and full of love for this album as a whole.  Unfortunately everything is expensive and I have accrued a good bit of debt over this passion project.  If you can help me get it out there to the world friends and neighbors, I would be forever grateful.  This has been a financial sinkhole of a year but I’m trying to keep on trucking and produce art even if it means doing one of these crowdfunding situations that I’ve never done before!  “Queen Of The In Between” includes ten of my original songs that I recorded in Eunice, LA in the spring of 2019 with some of my best friends and favorite musicians- Joel Savoy, Chris Stafford, Jim Kolacek, Trey Boudreaux, Megan Constantin, and Leah Graeff.  We all put our heart and soul into this album and I am ecstatic for you all to hear it!  Any and every donation of any amount is appreciated, and I’ve got some sweet little goodies as rewards too, so check them out and check out the project regardless of your ability to donate.  Thank you so much for taking the time to read this and please keep supporting music and the arts in any way you can.
With love and gratitude to you all, 
              Kelli Jones
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I suppose the biggest risk involved in this is that I (and everyone that has worked on the project) have put so much energy, love, and money into this all because we believe in it and think it’s an amazing project that we want everyone to be able to hear, I would hate for all of us to come out in debt and regretting any part of this process. This is a challenging age to put out original music and to get it out into the world, but we’re attempting it nonetheless, so any help is amazingly appreciated!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Spirit Crisis is a 2D adventure video game depicting a dark tale set in a mad time  when the Inquisition often deals with cases of heresy, witchcraft, demonic possession, vampirism and sanctification.
What's good or bad? You will have to choose through unusual events. Only the most audacious players will be able to solve their inner moral conflict.
Become a night agent and deal with hilarious and mysterious characters who will take you through an undergroud XV century experience. Are you prepared for this legendary  adventure?
REFERENCES
Video games such as CASTLEVANIA, INDIGO PROPHECY and MANIAC MANSION  were very important references in the development of the conceptual ideas and mechanics.
Inspired by legendary historical characters, anthropology and mythology of Europe, the gamer will interact within an approached, fantastic and parodic context of the XV century.
FEATURES 
2D side-scrolling adventure platformer video game.
Walk, run, jump, climb, push and pull objects, interact, talk, work, research, think and decide the path of your game with a complete new old-fashioned moral mental system. 
All the characters and tiles were drawn pixel by pixel, and animated frame by frame. 
15 chapters to discover amazing landscapes, ruins and dungeons through the town and the coast. A wild environment adapted to the adventure narrative.
5 unexpected crazy bosses.

A DARK VIDEO GAME SIMPLE TO PLAY.

SYNOPSIS 
SUMMER, 1498 
A remote village on the coast of Italy is going through a dark age. A wave of misery hit people with repression. Taxes and confiscations are paid to maintain a paranoid institution, the Holy Inquisition. 
A commission had been sent to the town due to allegations of desecration of holy places and public disorder that occurred during the feast of 1st. of May of the previous year. Since the establishment of the holy office, the midwife has been judged and executed, another woman is a fugitive, and for a month the oldest of the fishermen has been imprisoned accused of heresy, necromancy and conspiracy against the Mother Church.
My name is Francesco Endymion. Here I am in the temple, mesmerised by the threatening speech addressed to those who dare to leave the Lord’s Way. IT ALL BEGINS NOW!
THE CHARACTERS 
LANGUAGES 
 English, Spanish and Italian.

SKETCHES 


ARS NOCTEM CREW  
ABOUT ME
My name is Jorge Crepaldi. I’m a 33 year old Architecture graduate with an interest in anthropology, mythology and underground culture. I’m currently unemployed and I have coped with the pandemic by focusing on the creation of this video game.
When I decided to give shape to Spirit Crisis, I prepared myself studying narrative, game development, animation, game scene design, game characters design, some heretics books, and video game programming. I really hope you join this project and be part of what became a complete start up dream for me.

I've received invaluable help during the production from a crew of Inquisitors in charge of the assessment of the project.  
Jessika Martínez -La China-: Architect. Campaign coordinator.
Alfredo Cortez -Cagua-: Graphic Artist.  He’s making a hand art work to accompany the text narrative.  
Maurizio Crepaldi -Er Nano-: Astronomy enthusiast.  He’s making the astronomy map according to the time and the mysterious Italian location.  
 Alejandra Granda -Ale-: Architect.  English translator.  
 Melissa Gonzales -Meli-: Journalist.  Italian translator. 

 Thank you guys for all your time and dedication.
HOW WILL I USE THE MONEY ?
Your economic contributions will go towards reaching the stretch goals, keeping me focused on finishing the game on time, as well as compensating the crew for their precious help. 
Part of the money will go to taxes and production costs. 
Thank you all for giving me strength to make this video game possible.
THE PROGRESS
At the time of releasing this campaign, I have been able to solve  all the necessary mechanics that allow me to guarantee the development of the rest of the game without further difficulties. Also, the narrative of the story is completed. All the animations for the players, the NPCs, and objects are 90% ready. The scenes are 20 % ready. The rest of the artwork is in the process of being digitalized.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The biggest challenge of this campaign is the sound effects. Yet, I’m working on it, and I rely on the technical support needed to deliver a proper result. Once the stretch goal number 3 is reached, the sound effects will be delegated to a specialist. 

The risk is that I’m currently looking for a job. In any case, I’m very good at managing my time and I’m fully committed to this campaign and to give the rewards in the stipulated times. 

I’ll notify all the advances of the production to the supporters through the Kickstarter account,Twitter and Instagram. Any consultation should preferably be made by e-mail.

Email: spiritcrisis@hotmail.com

Instagram: spiritcrisis.videogame

twitter: @crisis_spirit

https://spirit-crisis.itch.io/
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: JUST HELPING OUT
support.descp:
Just here to help us boost our final counts? Sent by one of our friends? Don't care about getting a giant package of rewards or downloads? That's fine: We don't need a large pledge... we just need YOU!
At this level, you'll still be able to select Add-On Rewards and special "Last Minute Offers" from our friends + cast! Plus, you'll be able to increase your pledge AFTER the campaign if you want to upgrade to a higher-level reward package!
INCLUDES:
Weekly Production Updates
Access to "Add-On Rewards"

support.title: EXPERIMENT 15
support.descp:
Just want to be part of the experience?
Jump on board and get exclusive WEEKLY UPDATES AND PRODUCTION DIARIES all the way through production of Season 13. You'll also get a printable Gizmoplex "Founders" Certificate and ID Card, to prove you helped #BuildTheGizmoplex.
Plus, we'll even ADD YOUR NAME on a virtual wall of The Gizmoplex, in the private Backers' Lounge where Tom Servo tends bar!
INCLUDES:
Weekly Production Updates
Gizmoplex Founders' Packet (PDF)
Special Thanks in the Gizmoplex

support.title: EXPERIMENT 35
support.descp:
Get a first look at the future of MST3K with a 3 MONTH Gizmoplex Pass: your ticket to LIVE ONLINE PREMIERES of our next 3 new episodes, 24/7 watch parties, and much more! Plus, we'll sing your praises on social media AND add you to the "nice list" for this year's MST3K Holiday Card!
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
Gizmoplex Pass: 3 Months
A Holiday Card from MST3K
Special Thanks on Social Media

support.title: EXPERIMENT 50
support.descp:
Make your Season 13 experience last even longer: upgrade to a 6-MONTH GIZMOPLEX PASS and you'll be set for half a year of live events – including the premiere events for up to 6 new episodes!
Plus, get a super-collectible GIZMOPLEX STICKER and our COVID-safe MST3K@Home Kit, with digital backgrounds and avatars for all of your video chat needs.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
Gizmoplex Pass: 6 Months Total
The Gizmoplex Sticker
Download: MST3K@Home Kit

support.title: EXPERIMENT 75
support.descp:
Snacks are ALWAYS free at The Gizmoplex... as long as you make them yourself! But when you do, you'll want our GIZMOPLEX DIY CONCESSION PACK – our official and reusable POPCORN BUCKET and DRINK CUP – to put them in.
And you'll have even MORE time to use them, because we'll upgrade you to a 9-MONTH GIZMOPLEX PASS!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
The Gizmoplex DIY Concession Pack
Gizmoplex Pass: 9 Months Total
Download: MST3K Soundtrack, Vol 2

support.title: EXPERIMENT 85: ALL DIGITAL**
support.descp:
STANDALONE PLEDGE PACKAGE
(This pledge level is not included in higher levels as part of the "All rewards above...")
Want to make sure you'll get ALL of the DIGITAL REWARDS from this campaign, but without ANY of the PHYSICAL REWARDS and absolutely NO SHIPPING COSTS?
Well, this is the reward level for you! You'll get DOWNLOADS OF EVERY NEW EPISODE in Season 13, available to stream in the Gizmoplex AND to download in glorious HD with no insulting DRM. Plus, you'll get all of the digital rewards included in every reward level up through Experiment 150, along with any digital BONUS REWARDS unlocked during the campaign challenges.
*PLEASE NOTE: This level does NOT include the "Special Thanks in End Credits" reward. To be listed in the credits, grab Experiment 150 or higher... or get the credit as an Add-On Reward.
*If you want to upgrade to get all TEN CLASSIC EPISODE DOWNLOADS, just select the "CLASSIC EPISODE UPGRADE" Add-On Reward for $30 more.
INCLUDES:

support.descp:
If your #BringBackMST3K t-shirt is getting a little threadbare, maybe it's time for something new? Get the official SEASON 13 T-SHIRT, and you'll once again be the envy of those elitists on the catwalks of Milan.
Plus, with a 12 MONTH Gizmoplex Pass, your social calendar is set for the next year. (Get behind me, COVID!)
You'll also get a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of every new episode we make, AND we'll add them to your private collection at The Gizmoplex for 24/7/365 streaming and watch parties.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]

support.title: EXPERIMENT 150: THE POSTER
support.descp:
If you've been stuck at home for a year, you might be tired of staring at those same old walls... so why not fancy up the place with the OFFICIAL SEASON 13 POSTER?
Then, once it's hanging, feel free to ignore it and watch your MST3K CLASSIC BACKER PACK: five classic, fan-favorite episodes of MST3K, hand-selected by Joel.
Plus, be sure to make your friends watch the new season, so that you can point out YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS of a new episode!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]

All rewards listed above, plus...

support.title: EXPERIMENT 250
support.descp:
Sure, you'll be able to stream and download Season 13 through The Gizmoplex. But... what happens if the internet disappears!? Don't risk being caught without our new episodes: reserve your MST3K SEASON 13 COLLECTOR'S BOX SET, on your choice of charmingly dated DVD or Blu-Ray.
You'll also score the #MakeMoreMST3K CHALLENGE COIN "BACKER" EDITION. It's the perfect evidence for proving to your great-grandchildren that, way back in 2021, you were a founding supporter of The Gizmoplex: the first cineplex on the moon!
And, while you're waiting for the new episodes to arrive, relive even *more* classics with the MST3K CLASSIC DELUXE PACK: a total of TEN fan-favorite episodes of MST3K, hand-selected by Joel, and yours to stream and download!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
The Season 13 Box Set (DVD/BD)
The MST3K Challenge Coin: Backer
Download: 10 Classic Episodes

support.title: EXPERIMENT 350
support.descp:
You'll never forget that you helped #MakeMoreMST3K with the ultimate collectible keepsake: our ultra limited edition MST3K SNOW GLOBE & MUSIC BOX! Each one will be hand-painted, hand-numbered, and ready to enchant you with its gentle rendition of the MST3K love theme.
Plus, we'll upgrade you to the MST3K CHALLENGE COIN: DELUXE EDITION, with a different design and metallic finish. Take THAT, great-grandkids! This is what I did with your inheritance!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
The MST3K Snow Globe + Music Box

support.title: EXPERIMENT 400
support.descp:
Always wanted to see MST3K getting made, but can't break the bank or risk traveling before the pandemic is behind us? Have we got a deal for you: an invitation to our VIRTUAL SET VISIT, where you'll be able to spend a day watching our remote-production feeds live from the comfort of your own home, along with live Q&A sessions with members of our cast and crew.
And, to commemorate the experience, we'll upgrade your MST3K CHALLENGE COIN to the SET WATCHER EDITION, with a unique design and metallic finish that you'll treasure for years to come. (Or until you lose it.)
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]

All rewards listed above, plus...
Virtual Set Visit: Set Watcher

support.title: EXPERIMENT 500
support.descp:
So, you want to do more than just watch? Upgrade to VIRTUAL SET VISIT VIP ACCESS, and you'll get a chance to PARTICIPATE in the live Q&A sessions and INTERACT with our cast and crew, all from the (relative) safety of your own home!
And, so your friends know who they're dealing with, we'll upgrade your MST3K CHALLENGE COIN to the top-of-the-line VIP EDITION, with a unique design, finish and numbering!
Plus, we'll heap even MORE praise on you: You'll get SPECIAL THANKS in the END CREDITS OF THREE EPISODES *and* we'll read out your name to THANK YOU DURING A GIZMOPLEX LIVE EVENT!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]

support.title: "I PREFER THE ORIGINALS."
support.descp:
Don't care about the "new" MST3K? Prefer to relive your youth – or someone else's – with the classic Joel and Mike episodes? We've got just the thing!
You'll get DIGITAL DOWNLOADS of over 150 CLASSIC EPISODES & SHORTS from our first 10 seasons, and access to stream all of them 24/7 through our Gizmoplex website and apps. You'll also get a free month of RiffTrax Friends, 4 free RiffTrax downloads, and virtual tickets to a live RiffTrax event in the Gizmoplex. Push the button, Frank!

support.title: PERSONAL VIDEO FROM A BOT
support.descp:
So, you want a personalized video message, and the human celebrities on Cameo aren't cutting it? No problem! Get a CUSTOM VIDEO FROM A BOT, and let Crow, Servo, GPC, Waverly or Growler do the talking for you!
The bot of your choice will record a custom, non-commercial 45-second video based on your request.* It can't include special props or costumes, but you will be able to choose from several MST3K locations.
*See the FAQ for more details!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Personal Bot Video (45 sec)

support.title: PERSONAL VIDEO from the S.O.L.
support.descp:
Looking for an even MORE elite personalized video? How about this? We'll record a PERSONAL VIDEO FROM THE SATELLITE OF LOVE, shot just like our Season 13 host segments!
The host and bots of your choice will record a custom, non-commercial 60 second video based on your request.* We can't include special props or costumes, but you WILL be able to choose from a few MST3K locations!
*See the FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Personal SOL Video (60 sec)

support.title: PRIVATE MEET & GREET (ONLINE)
support.descp:
Want a more interactive video experience? Put those Zoom skills you've been developing all year to the test with a PRIVATE ONLINE MEET & GREET from the Satellite of Love.
Our human test subject and 2 bots of your choice will join you for a 10-minute Zoom conversation about cheesy movies, surviving quarantine, or anything else you feel like discussing.*
Plus, after your chat is over, we'll send you a HIGH-RES VIDEO of your conversation and an AUTOGRAPHED SCREENSHOT. All the perks of your favorite fan convention, from the comfort of your own home!
*See the FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Private Zoom w/ Host & Bots (10 min)
Autographed Screenshot

support.title: GET INVENTIVE WITH JOEL
support.descp:
Do you ever watch MST3K and think, "What kind of idiot comes up with these inventions?" Well, now YOU can be that idiot, when you join Joel to BRAINSTORM AN INVENTION that will appear in a new episode of MST3K – and when shooting ends, you'll get to KEEP A FEATURED INVENTION!
Get started when you join Joel for an online INTRO TO INVENTIONS & MAGIC class, where he'll explain his unique method for concepting and designing inventions, and explain how stage magic and sleight-of-hand can inspire new ideas. Then, join Joel and a small group online for an INVENTION EXCHANGE WORKSHOP, where you'll get to add invention ideas and give feedback.
Plus, you'll be listed as "Gizmonic Institute R&D" in the credits of the episode where your group's invention appears!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Keep an Invention from Season 13
Online Class: Intro to Inventions & Magic
Online Workshop: Invention Exchange
Episode Credit as "Gizmonic R&D"

support.title: VOICE ACT WITH M. WAVERLY
support.descp:
One of the breakout stars of MST3K: The Return, M. Waverly has inexplicably captured the hearts of MSTies everywhere. And now, for the first – and possibly only – time, you can literally put words in his mouth when you PERFORM A LINE AS WAVERLY in a new episode... all without leaving your home!
To prepare for your big voice-acting debut, you'll attend Joel's online INTRO TO ROBOT PUPPETEERING class, where you'll learn the secrets of memorable puppeteering from the pros who operate our bots on screen.
We'll also set up a PRIVATE ONLINE REHEARSAL with Joel and the show’s director, to make sure you're ready for your (audio) close-up. And, of course, you'll be listed as "Alternate M. Waverly" in the credits of the episode where your voice appears.
*See the FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Voice A Line As M. Waverly
Online Class: Intro to Robot Puppeteering

Episode Credit as "Alternate Waverly"

support.title: RIFF A SHORT WITH JOEL
support.descp:
You've dreamed of it. You've practiced in your living room, with your humorless cat as your audience. Now, it's time to do it.
Join a group of MST3K writers to RIFF A SHORT WITH JOEL for the new season! To make sure you're prepared, you'll join Joel and special guests for an online INTRO TO MOVIE RIFFING class, where you'll learn the finer points of riffing from the pros. Then, it's on to the online GROUP RIFF WORKSHOP, where you'll put your new skills to the test and contribute riff ideas for inclusion in an official MST3K short.
And, when your group's short premieres in The Gizmoplex, you'll be listed as a "Contributing Riffer" in the end credits!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Riff A Short w/ Joel & Team

support.title: ADOPT A ROBOT FRIEND
support.descp:
Has it ever crossed your mind that, whether it's on the SOL or in your own home, being trapped in quarantine would be a little more fun with a robot friend of your own?
Well, now you can plan ahead for the next pandemic and GET AN OFFICIAL ROBOT* featured in Season 13 to keep you company through the looming apocalypse!
To make sure you're prepared to care for your new robot friend, you'll also join Joel and special guests for our online INTRO TO ROBOT PUPPETEERING class, where you'll learn puppeteering secrets from the pros who operate our bots on screen.
And, in recognition of your selfless act, you'll be listed as a "Robot Foster Rescue" in the end credits of the episode where your new robot ward appears. Think of it as a pricey Cabbage Patch Kid.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Keep a Crow or Servo from Season 13

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER
support.descp:
Take your place next to Kinga at the top of the ladder and sign on as an EXECUTIVE PRODUCER for the ENTIRE SEASON.*
As soon as the campaign ends, you'll jump online for a PRIVATE VIDEO CHAT with Joel, where he can thank you himself and explain what we have planned. Get used to that, since you'll be entitled to monthly PRIVATE UPDATE CHECK-INS with Joel and the team throughout production.
You'll also get EXECUTIVE ACCESS every step of the way: script drafts, concept sketches, a private virtual set visit, pre-release episode cuts, and much more.
And of course, we'll make sure the world knows your name: You'll be listed as EXECUTIVE PRODUCER in all new episodes, on IMDB, the official poster, and all promo materials.
*You won't be responsible for doing actual work. That wouldn't be much of a reward. See FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]

For a select few patrons, we'll immortalize you as a GIZMOPLEX FOUNDING SPONSOR.
What does that mean, you ask?
How about this? We'll produce a CUSTOM PROMOTIONAL VIDEO for your business*, featuring our host and bots, and shot on the Satellite of Love or in The Gizmoplex. Then, we'll feature your new promo video in a FULL YEAR OF GIZMOPLEX EVENTS, so that MST-loving consumers everywhere will know what you did to help their cause.
We'll also create a CUSTOM SPONSOR PLACARD to hang in your business AND we'll place a VIRTUAL PLACARD in The Gizmoplex where guests can see it for years to come.
*See the FAQ for more details before claiming this reward.

support.title: EXPERIMENT 85: ALL DIGITAL*
support.descp:
STANDALONE PLEDGE PACKAGE
(This pledge level is not included in higher levels as part of the "All rewards above...")
Want to make sure you'll get ALL of the DIGITAL REWARDS from this campaign, but without ANY of the PHYSICAL REWARDS and absolutely NO SHIPPING COSTS?
Well, this is the reward level for you! You'll get DOWNLOADS OF EVERY NEW EPISODE in Season 13, available to stream in the Gizmoplex AND to download in glorious HD with no insulting DRM. Plus, you'll get all of the digital rewards included in every reward level up through Experiment 250, along with any digital BONUS REWARDS unlocked during the campaign challenges.
*PLEASE NOTE: This level does NOT include the "Special Thanks in End Credits" reward. To be listed in the credits, grab Experiment 150 or higher... or get the credit as an Add-On Reward.
INCLUDES:
Download: MST3K, Season 13
Gizmoplex Pass: 12 Months
Download: 10 Classic Episodes
Download: MST3K Soundtrack, Vol 2
Download: MST3K@Home Kit
Special Thanks on Social Media

support.title: PLAY JACKBOX with our CAST!
support.descp:
Want an even MORE interactive video experience? Added as a last-minute offer during our Jackbox Livestream, this reward gives YOU the chance to go head-to-head in a JACKBOX SHOWDOWN with up to four members of our cast.
The human test subject and bots of your choice will face off with you online for 45 minutes, and up to 3 rounds of comic brinksmanship... Plus, we'll give you a copy of Jackbox Party Pack ahead of time so that you can practice for your big match, thanks to our friends at Jackbox Games!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Play Jackbox w/ MST3K Cast (45 Min)
The Jackbox 7 Party Pack

support.title: BACKSTAGE VIP @ MST3K LIVE
support.descp:
Lord willin’ and the creek don’t rise, MST3K LIVE is heading back on tour late this year (or as soon as the powers that be decide it's safe to congregate in large numbers)*, and we want to offer something special. So...
Grab a friend and meet the tour in New York, Chicago or Los Angeles. You'll enjoy a GROUP DINNER WITH JOEL before the show, then hit the theater in style with 2 VIP TICKETS, a BACKSTAGE TOUR, a GREENROOM MEET-UP and PHOTO OPS with Joel and the cast, and a special VIP TOUR GIFT.
*Exact timing will depend on COVID, but we'll give you 6-8 weeks notice before the show date. See the FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Pre-Show Group Dinner with Joel
2× VIP Tickets to MST3K LIVE
Backstage Tour, Photo Op, Meet & Greet
2× Special VIP Tour Gift

support.title: VOICE ACT WITH M. WAVERLY
support.descp:
One of the breakout stars of MST3K: The Return, M. Waverly has inexplicably captured the hearts of MSTies everywhere. And now, for the first – and possibly only – time, you can literally put words in his mouth when you PERFORM A LINE AS WAVERLY in a new episode... all without leaving your home!
To prepare for your big voice-acting debut, you'll attend Joel's online INTRO TO ROBOT PUPPETEERING class, where you'll learn the secrets of memorable puppeteering from the pros who operate our bots on screen.
We'll also set up a PRIVATE ONLINE REHEARSAL with Joel and the show’s director, to make sure you're ready for your (audio) close-up. And, of course, you'll be listed as "Alternate M. Waverly" in the credits of the episode where your voice appears.
*See the FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Voice A Line As M. Waverly
Online Class: Intro to Robot Puppeteering
Online Workshop: Robot Puppeteering
Episode Credit as "Alternate Waverly"

support.title: ASSOCIATE PRODUCER
support.descp:
If you're ready to get even more involved, why not sign on as an ASSOCIATE PRODUCER for the new season?
In addition to VIP access during our Virtual Set Visit, you'll join Joel online each month for a group PRODUCER UPDATE MEETING. We'll send you a signed script and an exclusive producer-level gift. And, of course, to build your street cred, you'll get an ASSOCIATE PRODUCER CREDIT in three new episodes AND on IMDB.
Plus, to help you learn all about our process, you'll also get a free GIZMONIC INSTITUTE CLASSPASS, which gets you into all three of Joel's online lectures, covering Movie Riffing, Robot Puppeteering, and Inventions+Magic. (ClassPass does *not* include the hands-on workshops, which are exclusive to other pledge levels.)
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Associate Producer for Season 13
Monthly Producers Update Call w/ Joel
Signed Script + Producer Gift
3 Episode Credits as "Associate Producer"
Gizmonic Institute ClassPass

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER (Early Bird)
support.descp:
(20% DISCOUNT FOR FIRST 72 HOURS!)
Take your place next to Kinga at the top of the ladder and sign on as an EXECUTIVE PRODUCER for the ENTIRE SEASON.*
As soon as the campaign ends, you'll jump online for a PRIVATE VIDEO CHAT with Joel, where he can thank you himself and explain what we have planned. Get used to that, since you'll be entitled to monthly PRIVATE UPDATE CHECK-INS with Joel and the team throughout production.
You'll also get EXECUTIVE ACCESS every step of the way: script drafts, concept sketches, a private virtual set visit, pre-release episode cuts, and much more.
And of course, we'll make sure the world knows your name: You'll be listed as EXECUTIVE PRODUCER in all new episodes, on IMDB, the official poster, and all promo materials.
*You won't actually be responsible for doing actual work. That wouldn't be much of a reward. See FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $5000 level, plus...
Executive Producer for Season 13
Private Monthly EP Call with Joel
Exclusive EP Access to Production
Signed Script + Exec Producer Gift
Credit as "Executive Producer" (all eps)

support.title: GIZMOPLEX FOUNDING SPONSOR (EARLY BIRD)
support.descp:
($5000 OFF FOR THE FIRST 72 HOURS!)
Do you love MST3K *and* own a business? Maybe it's time to finally start mixing business and pleasure a little more.
For a select few patrons, we'll immortalize you as a GIZMOPLEX FOUNDING SPONSOR.
What does that mean, you ask?
How about this? We'll produce a CUSTOM PROMOTIONAL VIDEO for your business*, featuring our host and bots, and shot on the Satellite of Love or in The Gizmoplex. Then, we'll feature your new promo video in a FULL YEAR OF GIZMOPLEX EVENTS, so that MST-loving consumers everywhere will know what you did to help their cause.
We'll also create a CUSTOM SPONSOR PLACARD to hang in your business AND we'll place a VIRTUAL PLACARD in The Gizmoplex where guests can see it for years to come.
*See the FAQ for more details before claiming this reward.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $5000 level, plus...
Custom Promo Video from the Cast
Promo Shown At Live Events (12 Months)
Sponsor Recognition in The Gizmoplex
Custom MST3K Sponsor Placard

support.title: The Consoletation Zone
support.descp:
They say a problem shared is a problem halved. Submit your most pressing woe to GamesMaster host Dominik Diamond and see his thoughtful, empathic response preserved for posterity in the book's own Consoletation Zone section. Be it a rocky moment in a relationship, an emerging mid-life crisis, or perhaps you're just stuck on a level of Spyro the Dragon – Dominik can help. Please be aware we will not be held responsible for any repercussions that arise from you actually following Dominik's advice. And no Mario 64 questions.
INCLUDES:
A copy of GamesMaster: The Oral History signed by Dominik Diamond

support.title: The TonyHartMaster
support.descp:
Join internationally renowned artist Dominik Diamond for a 15 minute Zoom call in which he will create a unique artwork – a portrait of you, a scene from the show, a favourite game character... whatever your heart desires. The print will be embellished with gold foil typographic stylings confirming its authenticity and Dominik will conduct the call attired in a French beret and striped jersey. A serious art investment to be handed down through the generations.
Shipped to you by courier
Features your name in the book
INCLUDES:
A copy of GamesMaster: The Oral History signed by Dominik Diamond

support.title: BestDayEverMaster
support.descp:
Dominik will meet you outside season two filming location Kempton Steam Museum wearing some form of red jacket. You and Dominik will smoke a cigarette together outside, as the crew would do during filming, have a tour around the museum, and then head for a drink in a nearby pub. Later, you will head to Kempton Park Racecourse, where Dominik will put a £10 bet for you on the horse with the rudest name running that day.
Travel not included
Book shipped to you by courier
Features your name in the book
INCLUDES:
A copy of GamesMaster: The Oral History signed by Dominik Diamond

support.title: The PeaceMaster
support.descp:
Feel the hand of history on your shoulders by becoming the person to lead peace talks between Dominik and Dave Perry as they reunite for the first time in 25 years. You will accompany Dominik to the Revolver Tattoo Rooms in Torquay where you will both be tattooed by Dave in his studio. Afterwards, you'll kick back and play some '90s videogames with Dominik and Dave, before heading to a nearby pub to toast this historic pop cultural moment.
Travel not included
Book shipped to you by courier
Features your name in the book
INCLUDES:
A copy of GamesMaster: The Oral History signed by Dominik Diamond

support.descp:

support.title: The PoetMaster
support.descp:
Dominik Diamond will customise your book with a handwritten limerick about you and the GamesMaster show, melding you together with it for all eternity. At least as far as you are concerned.
Shipped to you by courier
Features your name in the book
INCLUDES:
A copy of GamesMaster: The Oral History signed by Dominik Diamond

support.title: The GamesMaster
support.descp:
Your own personal GamesMaster experience with Dominik Diamond himself. Enjoy an hour-long Zoom call with the show host in which Dominik will read choice extracts from the book, impart various unpublishable anecdotes and maybe even challenge you to a game. Invite up to three friends to this once in a lifetime opportunity for an audience with the GamesMaster compère!
Book shipped to you by courier
Features your name in the book
INCLUDES:
A copy of GamesMaster: The Oral History signed by Dominik Diamond

support.title: Topogato Collaborator
support.descp:
Creative collaboration with Simon & Beau, as well as a large assortment of treats.
As a collaborator, we will bring you into our process and together create a special limited edition treat.
Process:
We'll start with a flavor brainstorm over Zoom. We'll then take an idea or two that we come up with together, and explore in the kitchen.
We'll mail a prototype (or multiple depending on brainstorm), along with some notes from Simon, and through an email exchange gather any thoughts around flavor feedback and product art. After taking the notes into account, we'll refine the final treat and set a limited release schedule.
Once released, we'll mail you a box containing 6-8 (depending on format) of the final treats.
Additionally, we'll mail you the following assortment of treats and merch:
4 Banana Dulce Bars
4 Cocoa Espresso Bars
4 Packs Strawberry Almond Bars (8pcs)
4 Packs Coconut Passionfruit Bars (8pcs)
48 Assorted Truffles
1 Topogato Hat
1 Topogato Tote
2 Art Prints

campaign.story:
I am a game designer named Luke Crane. I love to make roleplaying games. Last year, I invented the perfect roleplaying game. After reflecting on its perfect majesty, I realized that this game was so perfect, other designers could use it to create their own perfect roleplaying games. This revelation inspired me to laugh out loud like so: HAH!
Cover mock up. Objects are closer than they appear.
Here is a list of the designers and games currently included the Perfect RPG zine:  
Redacted to reduce future harassment.
Our cover was illustrated by the inestimable Claudia Cangini. Our interior artists are Jabari Weathers, Claudia Cangini, Ariel ZB and Mary Georgescu.
A detail of Jabari Weathers' piece for Verily, You Are in a Dungeon!
Here is a perfect RPG to help you decide whether or not to support this project:  
You may note that you may pay $14, $15, $25 or $42 for this zine. Why pay more? Many of the designer's attached to this project have opted to take a share of the net. Thus if you pay more, each designer's share increases. 
Good question
Here's a spartan spreadsheet that hopefully shows you that our goal is accurate to our costs.
It ain't pretty.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Perfect is hard to attain and harder to maintain.

I have invited many of my friends to create their own perfect roleplaying games. I will collect all of my friends' games into a zine and then have really sweet artists create art for said zine and have Dro do the layout for said zine and then have mixam print said zine and then have UPS take the zines from mixam to Andy's warehouse and then Andy will put said zines in envelopes with postage and give said envelopes to the United States Postal Service who will then take said envelopes to your homes where you will receive them and open them and read said zine and laugh: HAH!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello.
I apologize for such a long silence in the wake of the project launch last month. I’ve been in a lot of conservations, and doing a lot of listening. I waited to post anything because I wanted to be sure to be as thoughtful and considered as possible:
When we began the Perfect RPG project, my only goal was to launch a small collection of micro-games designed by my friends and others whose work I respect in the community. On the day it launched, while the project was falling apart, I did not fully understand what was at stake and what had happened—in the shock of the moment my communications were insensitive and desultory.

project_data.project_name: The Perfect RPG (Canceled)

campaign.story:
A therapeutic mat for standing (or sitting) that lessens the effects of gravity and offers 7 therapeutic zones.
The greatest SITTING + STANDING desk mat EVER.
LUNAR is a STANDING + SITTING active desk mat
Want to get stuff done?
Like to feel GREAT while working?
Want to leave the office feeling loose and energized?
Fidget while you sit (or stand)?
Hate gravity (a little bit)?
Then you need Lunar
The Problem: Sore backs, pinched nerves, poor blood flow, and general fatigue are all common complaints of desk jobs.
How does Lunar help?
Stand Longer : over a half-a-dozen ergonomically designed features allow you to stretch, massage, and stimulate blood flow to your feet throughout the day.
Stay Focused : lunar engages your sub-concise allowing you to stay focused throughout your workday
Sit & Stand : lunar allows for enhanced standing & sitting with the patent pending "V-shape" design
Relieve Posture Fatigue : posture fatigue is a real reality of using a standing desk, keep your feet moving throughout the day and say goodbye to posture fatigue
Relieve Foot Fatigue: Face it your feet get tired throughout the day, engaging with LUNARS massage balls allows for proper blood flow to your feet
Relieve Stress : lunar engages your body in micro movements allowing your brain to relax
Feel Great : Leave work feeling energized and loose rather than tired and stiff
Look Great : Burn calories while you get work done
7 Therapeutic zones
7 distinct therapeutic zones.
 2 Lunar landing zones:  Stand on the soft and supportive mat that makes you feel like you are stepping on the moon.
 6 Shiatsu wheels: Use the Independent roller massage wheels to increase blood flow (and play with)
 2 Deep tissue roller balls: Work the muscles and arches of your feet with the rolling deep tissue massage balls.
 70 Soft-touch acupressure nobs: Slide and stretch your feet over the responsive pressure nobs to keep your feet engaged throughout the day and encourage blood-flow.
 3 grades of stretching zones for your calves and feet: Whether your legs are tired from work or play, you can use the stretching zones to help recover and stretch out your calves and feet with varying levels of intensity.
Massage balls, wheels, and knobs
Massage your feet with light acupressure or deep tissue massage centers.
3 stretch zones for your feet and calves
Streeeetch out your feet and calves on the three distinct stretch zones.
A NOTCH for your chair.
Slide your chair into the notch like I'm sliding into your DMs.
Don't Let Gravity Weigh you Down,  Go LUNAR
“Now when I go home, not only are my feet happy, but my back is happier. And I'm less tired. How does this magic happen? I don't know, I don't ask questions, I just freestyle on this mat like a tiny foam skate park for your feets. Let us never speak of flat mats ever again.” - Tysons Mom
---
“I can stretch my ankles, my calves, my arch, pretty much stretch anything from the knees down depending on how I want to stand on this. It is also nice to just stand on with no back pain.” - Tysons Cousin
---
“BUT...the cushion and the dips, lips and slants are heaven sent for tired, stressed, legs and feet. It has also prevented a lot of charlie horses in my calves because I can stretch them throughout the day.” - Tysons Grandma
LUNAR is not responsible for irresponsible movement on the mat. LUNAR is not actually made of moon rock and gravity is still in play.  Tripping and stumbling on the mat is not common however LUNAR takes no responsibility for face plants caused by irresponsible day-dreamers running, jumping and playing on the mat.
*Quick Story*
Hey Backers, It's Tyson. I've been working from a desk for the past 8 years. I've been through numerous desk setups and ergonomic options. I've tested almost every option on the market. From standing desks, ergonomic keyboards & mice, balance chairs, exercise balls, height-adjustable stands, monitor arms.. the list goes on and on.
Sometimes during the day, I’d straight up fall asleep, wake up an hour later in a drool puddle on my desk. (It was the classic "fall asleep at my desk scenario..)
So I started doing research on ways to “stay awake”.
One of the most common things that were coming up in my extensive google search was the term “standing desks”...
I learned they helped with productivity, and STAYING AWAKE.
So I ordered one immediately.
It arrived in a record breaking 2 days (thanks amazon).
I earnestly put it together and started using it.
I quickly learned within about a week of use I couldn’t actually stand all day!
My feet would get fatigued and I’d have to sit.
This was interesting, and so I did some more research and discovered this was a common issue.
The solution I found for this problem was a called an “anti-fatigue standing mat”.
These have been around for decades, used in tons of commercial applications... you know the ones you see your 5th grade teacher standing on by the whiteboard? (Yeah those ones)
So I ordered one, and it arrived in all it’s glory.
All it was, was a boring, flat poly mat, black, about 1in thick.
So I started using it, and it worked.. somewhat!
I could stand longer, but not all day.
I noticed my feet would still get tired.
I noticed my feet would still get fatigued.
I noticed I was still getting posture fatigue and my back would ache after a long 8 hour day.
I noticed my arches hurt.
This sent me on a journey of thinking and designing.
I wanted to come up with something that would allow me to move my feet while working without distracting me.
I wanted to come up with something that would allow me to massage my arches.
And that's how I came up with LUNAR.
It’s a standing mat that isn’t boring. It's a standing mat that also works for sitting. It's a standing mat that isn't flat. It's an active standing mat that helps you stay focused and get your work done.
Tyson started programming when he was 16.. so he was destined for the "Desk Life". The problem is Tyson cares about his body and doesn't want all the crazy side affects of the "Desk Job". That set him on a journey, testing every ergonomic office product available. That's what led him to create LUNAR.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Some of the biggest risks involved with this project are getting the product to our backers on time. Depending upon backer support, manufacturing and shipping time could increase. No matter what, we will do everything possible so our backers get the rewards.

The reason we are using Kickstarter is because we have finally finished prototyping of our product. We are now ready to produce this on a larger scale, and get it to our customers. We looked at other outlets, but we strongly feel this product could be far more successful as it gains momentum from Kickstarter.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hi there! I'm Tanja, and I love making games. For the past 8 months I've been working on The Dream almost fulltime, alongside my studies. With yours and Kickstarter's help, The Dream can be completed and released by February of 2023.
It is my first project on Kickstarter and honestly, I am both excited and... yes, a bit scared. But I suppose I am not alone. I have you guys!
The Dream is a first-person puzzle and aventure game. It's quite simple - everything you need to do is just walk around and enjoy yourself! Both day and night. Well, day and night in the game, of course. You will encounter surprises almost every step. You will search for clues and solve puzzles. Or it may not be that simple after all...
Initially, there will be a total of 200 puzzles in the game which can be solved in about 6-7 hours. But the more funding I receive, the more content and puzzles I can provide you. Which means more fun, of course. It's completely up to you!
You will also be able to walk under water and explore everything. Yes, it will be puzzles there too. Why always walk on land? It's so boring! 
Some time ago I was working as a system developer. That's when I tried to code in Unity for the first time. And I liked it more than making websites and systems for my clients! I wanted to make my own decisions about what to create. Making games gives me this posibility and I suppose that's why I like it so much. Now I am studying to be a virtual reality developer.
I started making The Dream in my spare time and I soon noticed that I enjoy this more than my studies. Whenever I worked on this project I felt very good. I'm learning a lot in school, and although I enjoy the tasks and the process, I have to be honest with myself about what I want. Therefore, if the project is sponsored, I will focus on it full time.

The world and the environment is about 95% complete. Now I work with puzzles and I find it very engaging. My inspiration for the puzzles comes from literally everywhere. It's the most fun part of the project. Sometimes I don't even notice that the day is almost over. Puzzles are the biggest part of the project and that's exactly what I'll be doing for the next two years.
Enjoy dynamic day and night
Enjoy seasons and weather effects
Feel no time pressure or stress 
Grab and move things
Decrypt important messages
Walk under water and explore things
Discover items and solve puzzles
Click on different objects to rotate them
  The Dream is planned to release on Steam (Windows, Linux and Mac). You guys, the ones who choose the Early Access tier, will get to play the game earlier then the others and give me your feedback. It will be so much fun!
Well, it's only me. The strongest team in the world! I code, make 3d models and I do marketing. Believe it or not, I love all of them. Sometimes it is difficult to do it all alone, but since I am not afraid of obstacles, it makes me fearless and strong in front of other problems in my life. And I don't like to give up! It may be why I love puzzles so much. I am an introvert and although I'm quite social, I know nothing better then sitting alone in my cozy corner and working on my game.
The Dream is getting bigger and it's hard to focus on something else alongside it. I love this game and I am sure you will love it too so I would be happy to see it finished and see you playing it as well.
It would be difficult to consistently work on it, considering I'm studying full time. With enough funding, I can focus all my attention on the game instead. And one more thing. Kickstarter gives me the support of you guys - a strong community of honest people, who will not hesitate to give me the feedback I need.
I need most of the money to pay my living costs untill I release the game. I will also promote my game. I promise you to pay my taxes. Everyone should.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
A big risk is that the project is delayed or worse, not finished. I've seen this in many other projects and therefore I did my best to give myself enough time to complete the game. But it all depends on you, because it would be difficult to drive the project forward without you supporting me.

The challenge I recognize in this project are the puzzles themselves, which are the core of the game. They have to be outstanding, otherwise the game will feel dull and uninteresting. So, I've done much research to gather the knowledge I need so that the puzzles become engaging. But I will not stop there. I realise that the game can always become better. That's why your feedback is extremely valuable to me.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Click to late pledge for Tiny Epic Dungeons!
All images, components, game mechanics, add-ons etc. shown of the game are subject to change per manufacturer's requirements and/or the publisher's preference for what is in the best interest of the game and the backers.
Tiny Epic Dungeons is a fully cooperative dungeon crawler for 1 to 4 players set in the fantasy world of Aughmoore. 
Here's a look at everything included in a base pledge: 
This image is updated with unlocked stretch goals.
28mm scale Factory Sample Photo (not final color).
Miniatures painted for example purposes only. Miniatures in the game will come unpainted.
In Tiny Epic Dungeons players control a band of Heroes exploring a treacherous dungeon in search of the fearsome Dungeon Boss.
Heroes make their way through the dungeon one room at a time. Around every corner goblins and ferocious minions seek to block the Heroes’ path.  Where there isn’t an enemy, traps are set, ready to spring on even the most prepared Hero.
Tiny Epic Dungeons features a modular dungeon that is unique with each play.
The game is played over 2 ACTS: the Dungeon and the Dungeon Boss. In both acts the players are constantly struggling against the waning firelight of their torch which decreases each turn. When the torch goes out, the Heroes are forever lost in the darkness.
After clearing the dungeon of all its minions and finding the entrance to the lair, players must engage in an epic battle against the Boss. Each boss has unique abilities and a lair with a unique environment that gives various advantages and disadvantages depending on the skill used and where the Hero attacks from.
These Epic Monsters cannot be slain by mere swords, axes, arrows, and the occasional spell. Ritual Rooms around the dungeon must be used to lower their magical bond to the dungeon. The Dungeon boss must be lured to these rooms to lower their defenses and allow the Heroes to strike the final blow!
Victory in Tiny Epic Dungeons is achieved by defeating the Dungeon Boss!
In order to do that, the Heroes will need to collect Legendary Loot, and Supreme Spells. 
Heroes of old crafted loot to honor the ways of their clans. Bear, Lion, Phoenix, and Panther. Heroes can discover pieces from these ancient sets that grow more powerful the more you collect. 
Will you be the greatest warrior the Bear clan has ever seen? Or will you make the Panther clan proud by stalking your prey and striking with surprising force, unseen before the moment of impact.
The story is yours to tell in...
When you pledge for a Deluxe copy of Tiny Epic Dungeons, you will receive the base game PLUS the Deluxe, Potions & Perils, components shown below.
This image updates with unlocked stretch goals.
The Potions & Perils mini expansion brings a whole new element to the game in the way of Potions and the perilous alchemists that concoct them... the Mixy Goblins!
Mixy Goblins are added directly to the goblin deck and are encountered like normal goblins. Except, they are not like normal goblins.  When you defeat a Mixy Goblin, something explodes! You'll draw a Potion Card to see what the effect is. Each Potion Card will describe a peril that occurs when you kill a Mixy Goblin and will also leave you with a handy potion for use later!
Additionally,  the mini expansion brings new Dungeon Bosses, Minions and Goblins to the game. Each presenting a unique challenge that will test even the best players! 
***Kickstarter-Limited Exclusivity - Deluxe content will not enter regular distribution. However, it will be available in limited supply at conventions, through contests, online at the BGG promo store, and directly from Gamelyn Games on our website or through our Amazon store.
This image updates with unlocked stretch goals.
In Tiny Epic Dungeons: Stories players dive deeper into the lore of Aughmoore. 
The Stories expansion introduces a new Story Mode that has Heroes completing Side Quests and adventuring deeper into the dungeon, descending Multiple Floors and eventually fighting multiple Dungeons Bosses at once!
In addition, Stories offers a slew of new Heroes, Loot, Dungeon Rooms, Dungeon Bosses, Minions, and Goblins! 
The Stories expansion will come in a box of the same thickness and quality of Tiny Epic Dungeons. It will share the same length and height as well. Making them great for storing side by side!
The Stories expansion is available in the 'Gameplay All-In' reward tier or as an add-on in CrowdOx after the project.
Click to view the work-in-progress rulebook

Please share this project with as many people as possible to help us achieve these goals and thank you for all the support!

See 'Shipping Details' below for shipping rates and VAT.
To keep shipping costs affordable, rewards will be shipped from three hubs: US, EU, and the UK.
Region-Friendly Shipping
All Tiny Epic Dungeons games and Tiny Epic Dungeons accessories will be Region-Friendly for the US, Canada, Europe, the UK, Australia and New Zealand.
Based on previous campaigns, we anticipate that you should not have any additional fees associated with receiving your reward package (customs, clearance, etc.) if you’re in one of these regions. If you’re outside of one of these regions, you may need to pay customs fees, specific taxes, and/or other local fees.
*Items added in CrowdOx after the project, that are NOT Tiny Epic Dungeons related, will be shipped from the US and all taxes and VAT for receiving the product will be the backer's responsibility.*
VAT
In compliance to the EU and UK laws, VAT will be collected in CrowdOx for EU and UK backers. VAT is not included in the shipping cost and will be a separate line item in CrowdOx. Some regions do require that taxes are remitted based on both the product cost and shipping cost, so keep that in mind as you plan for these costs.
Shipping Costs
Every backer is important to us, regardless of location, but the reality is that shipping is very expensive and is a cost we all need to share. To offset this, while remaining fiscally responsible, we have included a small discount for ALL shipping, but no shipping is free.
World(B) = Argentina, Belarus, Brazil, Chile, Croatia, Romania, Russia, South Africa
World(A) = All other countries, including the UK.
The most effective way to assure that we reach all potential upgrades is to share this project on your social networks: Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Instagram, blogs, etc. Share this project with EVERYONE!!
Here are some fun social media avatars you can use to help with that:
The 6 defining features of a Tiny Epic game!
"Tiny Epic" is an exclusive series of small box games produced by Gamelyn Games and designed by Scott Almes.
Each game in the series is entirely unique but strictly adheres to two core values: TINY and EPIC!
• TINY being the small box used for each game AND the simple, easy to understand, set of rules each possesses.
• EPIC being their surprisingly gratifying gameplay. Each is packed with meaningful decisions, layered strategy, and high replayability, traits not typically found in games this size.
To learn more about the series, please visit us online.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The publication of a board game is a highly involved process. It can be prone to many mistakes and delays, even for experienced publishers.

We are proud to say that we're prepared for the task at hand and have years of experience in successfully producing board games and fulfilling Kickstarter projects.

Here are the steps we take to prepare and reduce the likelihood of mistakes and delays:

1. We have done significant pre-production. This includes having all the illustrations for the game complete and the graphic art over 95% complete. The production quote is in hand and ready to be initiated.

2. We are working with an experienced manufacturing partner. We are familiar with their production requirements, timelines, payment schedules, communication methods and Chinese freight arrangements and costs for when it comes time for shipping. We will provide tracking information for the boat when the games leave China.

3. We are working with an experienced fulfillment partner. We are confident that they can handle any amount of work we send their way. They have fulfilled many projects and have proven to be communicative, punctual and respectful when dealing with our customers.

Above all, I am 100% dedicated to backer communication. I will be transparent with our process and involve our backers as much as possible. I will be present daily during the project to answer any questions and I read every comment. I will provide regular updates and supply photos of the progress.

Thank you for your trust in us! Let's bring Tiny Epic Dungeons to game tables around the world!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
A world without its heroes. 
Only villains remain...
...but a ghost of the past has returned to exact bloody vengeance. 
Bete Noir #2 and #3 (check out the rewards for a £1 digital #1 - mailed out today!)


We launched the world of Bete Noir on Kickstarter last year with issue 1 - raising many questions about the identity of the mysterious masked vigilante apparently returned from the dead...
Now join us as we continue that journey with issues 2 & 3 of the series - expanding on this strange damaged world that once had superheroes - but now just has the man calling himself The Djinn.
As the plot thickens, and the body count rises, The Djinn finds himself having to face off against old friends and enemies - foremost among them - the Marvellous Mystician.
Balancing action with ongoing intrigue and mystery - we are offering both of the 24-page issues of BETE NOIR #2 and #3 at the same time, alongside another chance to grab the original first issue.  Giving new readers a huge 72-page chunk of our bizarre protagonist and the threats that stand between him and his end game.
We are fortunate to once again be blessed with the atmospheric and powerful art of future superstar Kris Wantowhy. 
Kris has worked wonders in bringing our designs and vision for this dark, yet familiar world to life. 
If you backed our Kickstarter for issue 1 - you’ll already know that Bete Noir is a twisty journey of shocks and surprises. The Djinn is gathering resources, manipulating old friends and enemies, and settling old scores.
(Plus he has a cool Robot.)
Where does he get all those wonderful toys?
Issue 1 of Bete Noir was launched on Kickstarter last year and has gone on to garner critical acclaim: 

"Writer Andrew Clemson has managed to create an indie superhero book that feels different from the flood of books we already see in the mainstream ... with a far fresher feeling than I was maybe first expecting.  That’s an undoubted win to begin with but that’s backed up with suitably gritty & atmospheric art from Kris Wantowhy who gives the world a weight that hammers home the twists in the tale." - Comics Anonymous

"The story took hold of me from page one, lulled me into a sense of thinking that I understood the plot, then smacked me back into reality with twist after twist...An incredible rush of adrenaline that you never want to end.." - Fanbase Press

"Bete Noir leaves you with a lot of questions which you will find yourself thinking about long after you’ve read it." - Pipedream comics

"This story whirls up like an air raid siren in its pace and structure, and it's maddeningly brilliant...Superbly immersive and exciting Bete Noir is for fans of comics with a dark tone, beautiful sketch and ink art with a story meatier than a bigfoot steak. A series not to be missed." - Comic Book News UK
We've streamlined the pledge rewards for this campaign to keep things nice and simple. On offer are the regular covers, alongside a limited edition retro variant cover and a slew of awesome prints from guest artists! 
Retro Variant cover from Andy W Clift!
We also have pledge levels for those of you that may have missed issue 1, that allow you to catch up on the story and get ALL THREE ISSUES!  
All 3 regular covers for Bete noir issues 1-3
Our £35 pledge level includes awesome prints from CLARK BINT, KEVIN CASTANIERO, and KEITH SEYMOUR. You also receive the super-limited variant cover of Issue 1 from Indie comics superstars Sachi Ediriweera and Dan Lee! 
 We've also got a great value Digital Tier with other fantastic books from Mad Robot creators. 
Bete Noir 1-3, Damsel from D.I.S.T.R.E.S.S. #1, Saxon's secondhand books #1 and Vehi-Kill#1
Andrew Clemson is a writer from the UK best known for Sci-Fi comedy Star Bastard from Scout Comics and the smash hit adventure series Damsel from D.I.S.T.R.E.S.S. He thinks Adam Sandler's Big Daddy is a cinematic masterpiece for the ages and shall not be convinced otherwise.
Kriswantowhy is an Artist from Indonesia who has worked on a number of independent comics, including Dead Runner, Dinosaur Hunt, Buron, and Destined, as well as books for international publishers such as Chapterhouse.  Kris enjoys spicy food and is particularly partial to drawing comics about men in capes punching people and/or robots. (Where can we find one of those...?)


HDe is a sophisticated (Ringo nominated!) lettering A.I. from the UK with countless small press and Indie projects under his robotic belt. When he isn't putting words on people's pages and correcting the horrendous spelling errors in comic scripts about men punching space dinosaurs, he also runs a successful Youtube Channel devoted to gaming.
Matthew Hardy is the publishing editor of Mad Robot Comics and a trustee of the Gaming Vs Cancer charity. His writing credits include the CADAVERS series, numerous graphic novels including LAST EXIT TO BRIGHTON, MURDER MOST MUNDANE, HELL IN STALINGRAD, and all-ages adaptation of A STUDY IN SCARLET. Upcoming 2021 projects include VEHI-KILL from Markosia and CYBERARCHY from Heavy Metal. Man, that picture is cheesy as hell. He really needs a new one.
