updates.update_content:
Huge thanks once more to everyone who supporting this campaign. The enthusiasm for this book meant a great deal and we intend to reward that belief in us.
The funds have all cleared from Kickstarter (just a single £1 dropped backer) - so huge thanks to everyone for sorting that - and Kris is ploughing through the pages of art.
We intend to keep you guys as informed as possible on the progress of the art - so we'll be dropping regular pages - teasers for themes and ideas in the book - starting with this intense bit of backstory.

We're ticking along nicely, but we still need to find just £52 to unlock a full wraparound cover for issue 2! Please keep sharing the campaign to help us hit that target! 
In the meantime, we wanted to showcase some more great comic projects currently live on Kickstarter! 

House of Fear: Rubber and Glue from James Powell

Thank you again for your continued support for this series. A fellow creator recently called the book "a little bit Hellboy, a little bit Watchmen", and whilst we are not claiming to be either of those seminal works - we are certainly aiming to offer a cool book about vigilantes in a world without heroes. (Hopefully, we can capture a bit of Hellboy attitude as we go as well! )  :) 
OK - we took note that our digital pledge tier has been especially popular - so we are adding a deluxe version for those wanting more - or who don't want to wait for the post: -

We cruised past the £4,000 target we set ourselves, so now everyone will have a copy of my mini-print added to their rewards. If you're at a tier that qualifies for physical print packs, you'll get a physical copy, everyone else will receive a digital copy as part of their digital reward pack. 
Moving onto our next Stretch goal, we will be looking to expand the covers of the books to wraparound covers. Once we hit £5000 Kris will extend the artwork for the cover to issue 2 and it will become a full wraparound cover.

campaign.story:
Garphill Games, in association with our international partners are proud to bring you City of Crowns, and the Collector's Box for Paladins of the West Kingdom.
Kickstarter or retail? City of Crowns and the Collector's Box will be coming to retail in various languages. There are no exclusive items in this Kickstarter campaign. If you'd prefer to wait for the items to become available in retail, we are 100% okay with that. Please just choose whichever option works best for you.
In Paladins of the West Kingdom: City of Crowns, noble allies have responded to the recent attacks against our borders. Only through careful negotiation and diplomacy will these dukes, barons, counts and margraves offer the aid we so desperately need. Will you be able to muster enough support to once again defend this great city, or will you crumble beneath the weight of indecision and apathy?
Key Changes:
Board extensions for each player, providing a way to take the new Muster and Negotiate actions
Board extensions at either end of the Main Board, housing the new Muster and Negotiate cards, plus revealing more Townsfolk and Outsiders each round
Each player has a new Diplomacy attribute to manage
New Townsfolk, Outsiders, Paladins, King's Orders and King's Favours
Updated rules for solo play, with an added difficulty level
Components
This deluxe Collector's Box is designed to fit Paladins, City of Crowns, and all additional content, such as promos and metal coins. And yes, it fits sleeved cards. See the photos below. All boards sit together over the wooden components and smaller cards, keeping everything in its place. The box is the same size as the Collector's Box for Raiders of the North Sea (295x295x69mm).
The Vassals Mini-Expansion
Included inside every copy of the Collector's Box is a mini expansion, which adds new yellow workers to the game. These new Yellow Workers can be placed onto any Worker spot, regardless of its required colour. In addition to this, they also discount actions where they’re placed by either 1 Silver or 1 Provision.
For those not interested in getting the Collector's Box, we should have a small amount of the Vassals Mini-Expansion available in our Promo Store later in the year. It is not available separately for this Kickstarter campaign.


Preview from Meeple University
 Review from AllAboard Gamer
2-Player Playthrough with designers, Sam and Shem
Solo Playthrough with designer, Shem Phillips 
2-Player Playthrough from MvM
 2-Player Playthroughs from The Brothers Murph
2-Player online Playthrough from To Die For Games
2-Player Playthrough from Meeple University
To add-on additional copies of of any product, first select the pledge level that best suits what you are wanting. All shipping fees will be added at this point. Then simply add the cost of any extra items to your pledge level. This will need to be done during the campaign, as there will not be a pledge manager. All pledges are in NZD. There are no additional shipping costs for add-on items.
You cannot have multiple languages as part of the same pledge.
Two weeks after the campaign ends, we will send out surveys where you will have the chance to confirm what add-ons you included in your pledge.
Each copy of Architects will include the 2018 KS Promos (excluding the tax stand), provided in a separate bag.
Each copy of Paladins will include the 2019 KS Promos inside the box (in a separate bag of French/Portuguese).
Each copy of Tomesaga will include the 2020 KS Promos inside the box.
Groups:  Over the past 7 years we have always looked to improve how we handle larger group pledges. We want to offer the best prices, while keeping everything running smoothly for fulfillment. Therefore, we have set a lower price for all add-on items, regardless of the total quantity. There are no extra shipping fees for add-ons. There will not be any further discounts beyond this.

Retailers: We will not be taking orders for retailers in this campaign. We recommend going through normal distribution channels. If this is not possible for your store, feel free to contact us after the campaign has ended for a price list.
All shipping rates are automatically added as you select your Reward Level.
Garphill Games will handle production and fulfillment of all English versions.
Pixie Games will handle production and fulfillment of all French versions. The French edition is only available in France, Belgium, Luxembourg and Switzerland.
Mosaico Jogos will handle production and fulfillment of all Portuguese versions. The Portuguese edition is only available in Brazil and Portugal. All Portuguese copies will be sent using a tax-friendly shipping option.
Other Languages
Other language versions will also be produced on a similar schedule, but are not available through this Kickstarter campaign. This includes German, Italian, Spanish, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Dutch, Chinese, Thai, Japanese, and more. If you would prefer one of these languages, you will need to wait for the retail release in your country.

No Stretch Goals?
For this Kickstarter we have decided not to offer any stretch goals. Instead, all components will be upgraded from day one! Linen finish, black core cards, premium wooden tokens, thicker box, solo mode, etc, etc. On top of that, we have also heavily reduced the cost of all add-on items.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Having crowdfunded games in the past, I realize it can take a while from project start to completion (you getting your games). My goal is to have all products sent out before the end of November 2021. Project backers will be notified should this be delayed.

You can view my last project here -
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/shem/viscounts-of-the-west-kingdom-tomesaga
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone,
There's not much to say at this point. Booking vessels from China is taking a lot longer than previous projects, due to the backlog of cargo piling up over the last 18 months. I should hopefully have vessel details to share shortly though. Thankfully the manufacturing process was extremely fast, so we are still well within our original schedule.

In other news...

Hi everyone,
Production is still running smoothly. This week we will start organizing ocean freight for the English versions. At this point we know it's usually another 2-3 months before rewards start being delivered. So that is putting us well ahead of schedule. Of course, there's always chance for delays, so take that with a grain of salt. French and Portuguese versions are not far behind either.

Discord

Hi everyone,
We're in that quiet stage of the campaign, where there's really not much info to share. Nonetheless, I can let you know that all print files are now with the manufacturer. 90% of the digital proofs have also been approved by each publisher, which means production should kick off in the coming weeks. This pre-production stage usually takes 1-2 months, so we're making good time on this already. The next next big announcement to look out for would be me receiving the first mass-production copies. That could be in a couple of months. I'll aim to post another update in a month's time though, just to keep you all in the loop.

Hi everyone!
The surveys have been sent out now. Please remember that we do not allow any add-ons now that the campaign has ended - so no need to message me directly asking if it is still possible. If you missed out on something, all our products are (or will be) available in retail, over at www.garphill.com, and also in our future campaign for Architects: Works of Wonder.

That's a wrap! Thank you all for being a part of this project. Over the next 10 days Kickstarter will be processing payments. They should notify you if there are any issues.  We will be sending out surveys later today. Please note that we need these completed as soon as possible to get a good idea of how much stock to print. Don't worry though - you will have plenty of time and reminders to update your address again closer to fulfillment.

As a little thank you, here's the first look at the upcoming Collector's Box for Architects. This will be available alongside the Works of Wonder Expansion later this year (potentially on KS around June-July). But first things first - time to print City of Crowns!

Hi everyone!
Thank you all so much for joining us on this project. We've had a lot fun with the various livestreams, sharing some of the design decisions behind the expansion, and interacting over the KS comments. Special thanks to Pete Thane from the UK for replying to all the comments while I was sleeping - pretty much every day. You're a legend Pete!

Hi everyone,
As the campaign races towards the end, I just wanted to remind you that there will not be a pledge manager. If you are wanting any add-ons, you need to add the extra funds for them now. See the add-ons section, FAQ and examples of how add-ons work in our previous updates.

Spotlight On: Changes to Solo

Hi everyone,
We are down to the final two days now! Thanks to everyone who has been a part of this campaign, and welcome to all those jumping on at the end for the big finale - make sure you read the last update if you have any questions around how add-ons work.

Spotlight On: New Paladins

Hi everyone,
One of my favourite things to see in expansions is simply "more cards"! So with City of Crowns, we wanted to make that happen. We've already shown off the new Outsider and Townsfolk Cards. Now for some more...

Spotlight On: King's Favours
